sentences.english: The act expressly provides for injunctive relief.
sentences.chinese: 刑事救济规定对受害人进行充分补偿。

sentences.english: The young who break the law & commit a crime are both vermin & victims .
sentences.chinese: 违法犯罪的青少年既是害人者，又是受害者。

sentences.english: When late rend away victim Li Cheng wait a student the cellular phone is three and the lump is 47 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 当晚抢走受害人李成等学生手机三部及现金47元。

sentences.english: Thousands of years ago birthdays were considered a time when the bad spirits as opposed to the good spirits were able to harm you as this day changed a person's life.
sentences.chinese: 很多年以前，生日曾被认为是妖精来害人的那一天。

sentences.english: The victim beefed and went to the police.
sentences.chinese: 受害人去向警方告发了。

sentences.english: This is a case of the '.
sentences.chinese: 这就是害人反害己的例子。

sentences.english: Victim is Caucasian female, approximately twenty-five years old.
sentences.chinese: 受害人是个白种人女性，大概在二十五岁。

sentences.english: How to safeguard the behoof of the victim becomes the topic that people concern very much .
sentences.chinese: 如何保护受害人的利益，成为人们十分关心的话题。

sentences.english: This is the very knife which he used to murder the victim.
sentences.chinese: 他就是用这把刀谋杀了受害人。

sentences.english: The victim can be any gender. The harasser can be any gender.
sentences.chinese: 性骚扰者和受害人并非仅限于某单一性别。

sentences.english: There was no harm in him, you know, he was only wild.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，他没有什么害人之处，就是野了点。

sentences.english: The victim, identified by his surname Lu, was a freshman in Sichuan Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 这位受害人姓卢，是四川师范大学的一名大一新生。

sentences.english: Police are carrying out an analysis of the dirt on the victim; s botts .
sentences.chinese: 警察在对受害人鞋上的泥土进行化验分析。

sentences.english: Many users do not still have been cursing his "harming others and themselves" do?
sentences.chinese: 不依然有众多网友在骂其“害人害己”吗？

sentences.english: Investigate into the offenders relocation information in any other institute;
sentences.chinese: and二调查加害人在其他机构之处遇资料。

sentences.english: Own petard when he tried to kill his wife.
sentences.chinese: 罪犯想杀死自己的妻子，结果害人不成反害了自己。
